title: STEAM-Based 21st-Century Competency Development Program: Collaboration-Centered Science Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with Basic Science Concepts and Online Tools
context.additional_context: Enhancing the capacity of in-service secondary science teachers to apply STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, Mathematics) education models.

learning_goals: Learners can design project proposals integrating STEAM elements (Science-Technology-Engineering-Arts-Mathematics)
Learners can establish role allocation and feedback systems among team members using online collaboration tools
Learners can develop and apply a rubric to assess collaboration skills among the 4C competencies in actual projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
